files.name: Nightfall_CBC_80-10-10_15_Special_Services.mp3
files.title: Special Services
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A couple on their way to visit a sick aunt are run off the road by an ambulance. The husband is rushed to a 'special services' hospital which claims to treat only the elite of society, but his wife suspect the doctors are lying about his sudden demise in the operating room.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-10-29_05_The_Dentist.mp3
files.title: Dentist
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A dentist begins to realize that a long lost friend's strange behavior may coincide with the recent string of child murders.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_83-01-14_15_Weather_Station_Four.mp3
files.title: Weather Station Four
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: Two men are trapped at a remote weather station in the Arctic by a violent storm. One is a veteran of the far north, but the other is an emotionally unstable rookie who begins to hear a female voice on the radio goading him to murder and madness.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_81-12-25_13_Appetite_of_Mr_Lucraft.Mp3
files.title: Appetite of Mr Lucraft
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: In Victorian England, a man's voracious appetite leads him to some very interesting people.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-06-04_27_Beyond_the_Law.mp3
files.title: Beyond the Law
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: When his partners start being murdered, a real estate developer decides to retaliate against the Tenant's Association that he blames for their deaths.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_83-02-04_18_Beautys_Beast.mp3
files.title: Beauty's Beast
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: Unable to buy off the attentions of a suitor to his beautiful daughter, a wealthy industrialist researcher subjects him to a bizarre comeuppance by making him the subject of a deadly new serum he has invented.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-02-19_13_The_Thinking_Room.mp3
files.title: Thinking Room
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A young man who wants to kill himself discovers a secret club devoted to learning about suicide, and planning for the Special Day.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-03-05_15_Volcano.mp3
files.title: Volcano
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A psychiatrist uses experimental methods to train a down-on-his-luck boxer.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-11-12_07_Lazarus_Rising.mp3
files.title: Lazarus Rising
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A reporter becomes entangled in a web of revenge and sorcery when he arrives in a small country town to investigate the incredible report of a man who apparently rose from the dead.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_81-05-15_46_All_Nighter.mp3
files.title: All Nighter
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: An aspiring actress, who works at a laundry mat until she gets her "big break", discovers a small piece of human skin in one of her machines. Then she finds a body in the dryer. She enlists her best friend to stay up all night with her to find out what's going on.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_81-12-11_04_In_the_name_of_the_Father.mp3
files.title: In the name of the Father
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A grieving writer, wanting peace, goes to a small, remote fishing village. There she discovers the town's dark secret.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_83-02-25_21_Glaze_of_Perfect_Beauty.mp3
files.title: Glaze of Perfect Beauty
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: An obsessive potter accidentally knocks his assistant into the kiln and finds that human ash makes the best glazes. However, the quality of the person is key to the quality of the glaze. He seeks perfection of his art at any price.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_83-06-17_37_The_Chrysalids_Part_2.mp3
files.title: Chrysalids Part 2
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: In an irradiated post-Holocaust future, Mankind is rebuilding civilization, but he still harbors the same old evils of prejudice, intolerance, and fanaticism, now directed toward anyone unfortunate enough to have been born with any variation on the established physical norm.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_80-10-03_14_The_Stone_Ship.mp3
files.title: Stone Ship
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A 19th century ship's crew encounter a ghostly vessel in a thick night fog. Her hull is made of stone and the putrid stench about her is the stench of death. Despite their superstition and fear, they feel compelled to board her...

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-12-03_10_Daddys_Girl.mp3
files.title: Daddy's Girl
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A man on vacation in the West Indies gets more than he bargains for when he gets on the wrong side of a young girl who is a practitioner of black magic. Can he escape and tell the authorities of the strange deaths that have occurred on the island before it's too late?

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_81-01-09_28_A_Shortwave_Goodbye.mp3
files.title: Shortwave Goodbye
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A man has a shortwave radio which picks up future newscasts. He uses it for personal enrichment, and as an aid in killing his wife.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_81-11-20_01_Carmilla.mp3
files.title: Carmilla
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: Set in Germany's Black Forest. A wealthy man and his daughter receive a mysterious house guest who has a secret life, one which threatens to destroy anyone who encounters her.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_80-09-19_12_Wind_Chill.mp3
files.title: Wind Chill
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: Trapped in a remote cabin by a violent snowstorm, a woman finds comfort in the unexpected company of an enigmatic young man, and discomfort in the wailing of a child out in the storm.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_80-10-17_16_Buried_Alive.mp3
files.title: Buried Alive
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A sleazy hypnotist fakes his own death for the insurance money. He awakens in his coffin with an oxygen tank and an intercom, and waits for his wife and assistant to dig him up. Unfortunately, the two "rescuers" are having an affair and decide to leave him entombed.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_83-06-24_38_The_Chrysalids_Part_3.mp3
files.title: Chrysalids Part 3
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: In an irradiated post-Holocaust future, Mankind is rebuilding civilization, but he still harbors the same old evils of prejudice, intolerance, and fanaticism, now directed toward anyone unfortunate enough to have been born with any variation on the established physical norm.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-04-02_19_The_Debt.mp3
files.title: Debt
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A fraternity initiation ritual goes too far, and the young man being initiated is killed. And that's the end of that. Or is it...

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-03-26_18_The_Old_Post_Road.mp3
files.title: Old Post Road
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A couple late for a dinner engagement take a shortcut down a deserted road where they encounter a series of increasingly bizarre paranormal events.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_81-03-27_39_Book_of_Hell.mp3
files.title: Book of Hell
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A publisher receives a manuscript by a dead author which claims to be an accurate account of the horrors of the underworld. Sensationalistic trash, except that for some reason the pages will not copy, and things start going very wrong for anyone who reads the thing.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_80-11-07_19_The_Devils_Backbone.mp3
files.title: Devil's Backbone
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: Three treasure seekers looking for Spanish gold from a sunken galleon off the Nova Scotia coast are frustrated in their quest by a strange creature which has set up house in the wreck.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-06-25_30_Tige_OKane_and_the_Corpse.mp3
files.title: Teig O'Kane and the Corpse
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: Based on the story Douglas Hyde. Ne'er-do-well Irishman Teig O'Kane is accosted by some little men (fairies, I think) and given the task of burying a talkative corpse before sunrise.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_81-03-20_38_Angels_Kiss.mp3
files.title: Angel's Kiss
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A man meets a woman in a night club and gets lucky - or does he?

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_80-07-25_04_Hands_Off.mp3
files.title: Hands Off
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A chemical designed to trigger aggression accidentally spills in the laboratory, getting on the hands of its inventors. The scent causes everyone and everything they encounter to react with murderous hatred.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_83-04-22_29_Hypnotized.mp3
files.title: Hypnotized
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A woman under hypnotic regression begins recollections of a very disturbing previous incarnation, in which she has some attachment to the Devil...

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_83-03-18_24_Private_Collection.mp3
files.title: Private Collection
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: Young women are disappearing in the middle of downtown, in broad daylight. Can Constable Wood figure out what's going on, before it's too late?

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-01-08_07_Gerald.mp3
files.title: Gerald
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A small town minister is drawn into the search for someone who tortures and kills animals. When his own dog and then his son's best friend Ricky are killed, he can't understand why his son Gerald seems to be so unaffected by the loss.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-04-30_23_Mr_Agostino.mp3
files.title: Mr Agostino
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A story which is scary by virtue of the fact that it actually could happen. Carole is plagued by a mysterious man who keeps calling and asking for Mr Agostino. Its just a wrong number. Right?

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-02-05_11_Childs_Play.mp3
files.title: Child's Play
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A couple move into the wife's childhood home, in spite of the memories of her parents, who were murdered there in their bed when she was a little girl. Bad idea.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_83-01-21_16_Brides_of_Olivera.mp3
files.title: Brides of Olivera
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A woman becomes convinced a fortune teller is an infamous serial killer who uses his psychic powers to destroy his victims.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-05-21_26_A_Glimpse_of_Eternity.MP3
files.title: Glimpse of Eternity
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A university professor researching longevity reluctantly agrees to try out his experimental formula on a willing friend, who soon afterward starts undergoing an extraordinary and disturbing metamorphosis.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-11-26_09_But_Oh_What_Happened_To_Hutchings.mp3
files.title: But, Oh! What Happened To Hutchings
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: England, in the 19th century, is the setting for this episode. Times are hard, and making ends meet is extremely difficult. Grave robbing, therefore, is a lucrative business in an otherwise sterile job market. Why wait for the bodies to drop over of natural causes, though, when you can speed up the process a bit?

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_80-08-29_09_The_Body_Snatchers.mp3
files.title: Body Snatchers
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A classic story of a young medical student who suddenly finds himself dealing with grave robbers and worse.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_83-02-11_19_Angel_of_Death.mp3
files.title: Angel of Death
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: During the First World War, a woman is haunted by the mournful cries of her brother - killed on the Western Front - supposedly coming from the attic of her family home.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_80-10-24_17_Last_Visit.mp3
files.title: Last Visit
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A couple on vacation in Newfoundland are waylaid by heavy fog in a remote area where they keep running into the same local yokel, although in different guises. More than a little creeped out, they try to walk out of town, but that seems to be impossible...

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_83-04-01_26_Walters_Dog.mp3
files.title: Walter's Dog
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: An alcoholic lobsterman decides to murder his boss in order to become a man in his own eyes.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_80-08-15_07_Future_Fear.mp3
files.title: Future Fear
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: After getting his television repaired, a man is horrified to behold broadcasts from the future, a future in which his wayward criminal son will become the new Hitler.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_83-06-10_36_The_Chrysalids_Part_1.mp3
files.title: Chrysalids Part 1
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: In an irradiated post-Holocaust future, Mankind is rebuilding civilization, but he still harbors the same old evils of prejudice, intolerance, and fanaticism, now directed toward anyone unfortunate enough to have been born with any variation on the established physical norm.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_80-10-31_18_Ringing_the_Changes.mp3
files.title: Ringing the Changes
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A honeymoon couple arrive in a sleepy Cornwall village seeking a place to celebrate. Their choice of an out-of-the-way town proves unwise, as the town has a very special tradition.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-12-17_12_The_Signalman.mp3
files.title: Signalman
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A railroad signalman is driven to the brink of madness by a spectral apparition at the mouth of a train tunnel, which seems to be trying to warn him of... what?

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-12-10_11_Cruel_Husband.mp3
files.title: Cruel Husband
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: Its a tale of infidelity, and of revenge. A Count discovers his wife's infidelity and takes steps to see that it doesn't happen again.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-07-02_01_They_Bite.mp3
files.title: They Bite
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: An alien disregards protocols and contacts the primitive...(missing text)

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-01-29_10_Teddy.mp3
files.title: Teddy
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A five year old is tormented by the constant din of other people's thoughts flooding into his mind. If that weren't bad enough, there are ruthless people who want to use him to their own selfish ends, including his own parents. Poor Teddy is helpless to prevent them - or is he?

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_80-07-18_03_Welcome_to_Homerville.mp3
files.title: Welcome to Homerville
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A trucker on a lonely road to Homerville seeks out a little company on his CB radio, but the other truckers are horrified to learn of his destination, and plead with him to turn around, to avoid Homerville at any cost.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-08-06_06_The_Thinking_Room.mp3
files.title: Thinking Room
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A young man who wants to kill himself discovers a secret club devoted to learning about suicide, and planning for The Special Day.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_83-01-28_17_The_Contract.mp3
files.title: Contract
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A young man find himself on hard times, or so it seems. He is indebted to a man he met in prison. He just can't seem to get the money, so things look bleak for the man. Luckily, his wife is sympathetic, and rich. She can bail him out. Unfortunately, what she mistakenly believes is a heavy gambling debt is actually a contract to have her killed.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_81-01-30_31_Welcome_to_Homerville.mp3
files.title: Welcome to Homerville
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A trucker on a lonely road to Homerville seeks out a little company on his CB radio, but the other truckers are horrified to learn of his destination, and plead with him to turn around, to avoid Homerville at any cost.

files.name: Nightfall-inThenameOfTheFather.mp3
files.title: In The name Of The Father
files.creator: Ep 42 - In the name of the Father
files.artist: Ep 42 - In the name of the Father
files.description: A grieving writer, wanting peace, goes to a small, remote fishing village. There she discovers the town's dark secret.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_81-03-06_36_The_Room.mp3
files.title: Room
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: Enticed by an eccentric, yet wealthy widow's substantial reward, a sceptic accepts an offer to spend a night locked in a supposedly haunted room in her mansion... despite the fact that previous volunteers have all gone insane or committed suicide.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_81-05-08_45_Future_Fear.mp3
files.title: Future Fear
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: After getting his television repaired, a man is horrified to behold broadcasts from the future, a future in which his wayward criminal son will become the new Hitler.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_81-02-13_33_Late_Special.mp3
files.title: Late Special
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: Blinded and injured in a car accident in the middle of a blizzard, Claire tries to find help in an abandoned train station. An old steam train pulls in, and a man from the train offers her help "for a price".

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_83-02-18_20_Semi-Detached.mp3
files.title: Semi-Detached
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A young girl living in a foster home finds herself potentially homeless when her 'parents' announce they are expecting. She is helpless to prevent being cast aside, ... or is she? Strange, unnatural things start to happen around the house.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-07-16_03_Angels_Kiss.mp3
files.title: Angel's Kiss
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A man meets a woman in a night club and gets lucky - or does he?

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_81-04-03_40_Mkara.mp3
files.title: Mkara
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: Charles Woodley flees to the highlands of Ethiopia to escape a curse that has been laid upon him for killing a sacred bull elephantâ€”a curse which would cause him to die horribly, trampled beneath the feet of the God of All Elephants, if he were to stay in Tanganyika. There are no elephants in the Ethiopian highlands...

files.name: Nightfall-buriedAlive.mp3
files.title: Buried Alive
files.creator: Nightfall Buried Alive
files.description: A sleazy hypnotist fakes his own death for the insurance money. He awakens in his coffin with an oxygen tank and an intercom, and waits for his wife and assistant to dig him up. Unfortunately, the two "rescuers" are having an affair and decide to leave him entombed.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-07-23_04_The_Book_of_Hell.mp3
files.title: Book of Hell
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A publisher receives a manuscript by a dead author which claims to be an accurate account of the horrors of the underworld. Sensationalistic trash, except that for some reason the pages will not copy, and things start going very wrong for anyone who reads the thing.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-11-19_08_Young_Goodman_Brown.mp3
files.title: Young Goodman Brown
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A young man journeys into the woods bordering his home village at dusk and encounters a strange man and a wicked Satanic ritual.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_81-12-04_03_Cemetery_Stop.mp3
files.title: Cemetery Stop
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A recently widowed bus driver is haunted by a strange woman who everyday insists on getting off at a lonely stop outside of a Toronto cemetery.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-06-18_29_Reverse_Image.mp3
files.title: Reverse Image
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A milquetoast purchases an antique mirror and encounters an alter ego of himself, which offers to exchange places for awhile to take revenge on everyone who has treated him like a doormat.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_81-11-27_02_In_the_Eye_of_the_Beholder.mp3
files.title: In the Eye of the Beholder
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: When an ill-tempered old farmer refuses to have surgery for his cataracts, a mysterious young man shows up to help him, and the farmer's past comes back to haunt him.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-03-12_16_The_Monkeys_Raincoat.mp3
files.title: Monkey's Raincoat
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A satirical vision of the future of American politics, as a freshly inaugurated President must prove his caliber (pun intended) by eliminating several assassins on his way to the White House.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-04-16_21_The_Jogger.mp3
files.title: Jogger
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A former high-school football star who is in decline and well past his "glory days" is haunted by a mysterious jogger, whom he feels he must catch at all costs.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_81-04-10_41_The_Repossession.mp3
files.title: Repossession
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: The spirit of a twin which died during separation at birth returns to claim the life and body of the surviving brother.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_80-08-01_05_The_Telltale_Heart.mp3
files.title: Telltale Heart
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A man of questionable sanity decides to do away with his tenant for the sole purpose of ridding the presence of the man's vulture-like eye. The landlord hides the body beneath the floor boards in a manner that would evade detection of even the most meticulous inspection. It's a perfect crime, except for the fact that the victim's heart beats in the ears of the murderer, crying out for justice.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-05-14_25_The_Maids_Bell.mp3
files.title: Maid's Bell
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A maidservant takes a job with a kind but sad mistress who suffers from a weak heart, a cruel and tyrannical husband, and the presence of a deceased former maid who refuses to leave the house.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_83-03-11_23_The_Undertaker.mp3
files.title: Undertaker
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: As the titular undertaker (or mortician) - a somewhat caddish ladies' man - prepares the body of a woman who loved him, he reminisces, gets drunk, and has a one-night stand.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_81-05-01_44_Breaking_Point.mp3
files.title: Breaking Point
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: What do you get when you throw together a circus owner, his showgirl girlfriend, and a strongman? It all adds up to murder... most foul.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-11-05_06_Assassin_Game.mp3
files.title: Assassin Game
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: In a world controlled by rival corporations, university students are tested for their potential cunning as future executives via the 'Assassin Game', where they engage in mock hits exacted against fellow students. However, when one student rejects a job offer from a major company that doesn't take no for an answer, the 'game' gets more than a little out of hand...

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-10-15_03_Lifeline.mp3
files.title: Lifeline
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A man loses more than the lines in his palms as the result of burns in an apartment fire.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_83-03-25_25_The_Hit.mp3
files.title: Hit
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: Two bumbling, bickering hitmen head for a job; one of them is in for a surprise.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_80-08-08_06_Late_Special.mp3
files.title: Late Special
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: Blinded and injured in a car accident in the middle of a blizzard, Claire tries to find help in an abandoned train station. An old steam train pulls in, and a man from the train offers her help "for a price".

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_80-11-28_22_Deadly_Developments.mp3
files.title: Deadly Developments
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A stolen camera has the ability to render anyone who is photographed by it dead.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-02-26_14_The_Porch_Light.mp3
files.title: Porch Light
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A couple rent a remote house in the country unaware that it had been the site of a brutal murder spree twenty years earlier. A nocturnal visitor appears on their porch who can illuminate them in a most poignant way.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-01-15_08_Mindrift.mp3
files.title: Mindrift
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A government agent lands in New Your City on a mission to do... something. He knows only that he is programmed to carry out the mission, whatever it might be.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-10-22_04_The_Tie_That_Binds.mp3
files.title: Tie That Binds
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A 38 year old man relates how he came to be at an asylum. In a drunken stupor, he rolled his car and killed his wife. After such, he suffers ill effects that seem to have no physical basis. After he collapses, he awakens to find himself certified in a psychiatric facility. The trouble is, he isn't crazy. At least, that's what the voice inside his head keeps telling him.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_83-04-29_30_After_Sunset.mp3
files.title: After Sunset
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: Fifty years after a small town suffers a grisly series of murders, the killings begin again, leading some of the town's elderly to suspect the return of an entity as ancient as it is evil.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_83-04-15_28_The_Wedding.mp3
files.title: Wedding
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: In the late 1600's, a Jewish family embarks on planning a wedding. The superstitions of the father and bride-to-be run amok, fostered by a recent plague which hit the village. Times are better now, or so they think, until a strange jester offers to perform at the wedding. When the day comes, he arrives and expects payment upon services rendered. The miserly father reneges, much to the chagrin of the wedding party. They soon find out it is no laughing matter when you cheat a wandering jester.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_83-03-04_22_No_Quarter.mp3
files.title: No Quarter
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: What happens when video games take over your life?

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-04-23_22_The_Screaming_Skull.mp3
files.title: Screaming Skull
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A retired sailor relates the tale of how and why he came to be haunted by a screaming skull.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_81-02-27_35_Wildcats.mp3
files.title: Wildcats
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: Two elderly sisters running an almost abandoned hotel take in a stranger who gets off a train by accident and needs to stay the night. Will they ever let him leave?

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_80-09-05_10_Willoughby_Obsession.mp3
files.title: Willoughby Obsession
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: What happened in the Willoughby mansion the night that three people died there? What happened to the former gardener who was found babbling incoherently and dying? And what is that strange presence in the library?

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_81-02-20_34_The_Monkeys_Paw.mp3
files.title: Monkey's Paw
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: The classic tale of a talisman in the form of a shrunken monkey's hand which holds the power to make wishes come true, but not in the way the wisher might expect...

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_80-12-26_26_Dreamy.mp3
files.title: Dreamy
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: No description available.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-10-08_02_Footsteps.mp3
files.title: Footsteps
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: After narrowly missing being killed by a truck, an ad executive becomes obsessed with the sound of footsteps following him wherever he goes.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_81-01-02_27_Guest_of_Honor.mp3
files.title: Guest of Honor
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: Lady Neville is old and has one last wish - to throw the grandest, most outrageous party in the history of London. To make it so, she invites the most infamous guest of allâ€”the Grim Reaper.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_81-03-13_37_Wind_Chill.mp3
files.title: Wind Chill
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: Trapped in a remote cabin by a violent snowstorm, a woman finds comfort in the unexpected company of an enigmatic young man, and discomfort in the wailing of a child out in the storm.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_80-07-04-Love_and_the_Lonely_One.mp3
files.title: Love and the Lonely One
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: Two medical students pull a prank involving a cadaver of an old woman. The next day, one of the students is pursued by a beautiful young woman who dresses, decorates, and acts like it's sixty years earlier. And she won't let him go.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_80-09-26_13_The_Repossession.mp3
files.title: Repossession
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: The spirit of a twin which died during separation at birth returns to claim the life and body of the surviving brother.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_81-12-18_05_Baby_Doll.mp3
files.title: Baby Doll
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A husband makes a gift to his wife of an antique doll, which she receives as a sick joke, since they are childless. But her initial anger soon turns to a fanatical maternal obsession that threatens to destroy them both.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-04-09_20_Harris_and_the_Mare.mp3
files.title: Harris and the Mare
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A man's innocent view of the general goodness of mankind is shattered by his wife's murder.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_81-04-17_42_The_Fatal_Eggs.mp3
files.title: Fatal Eggs
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: Set in communist Russia, a scientist discovers a compound, which when injected into chicken eggs, produces giant chickens. Only the government gets hold of the compound and accidentally injects it into snake eggs, with really fun results.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-01-01_06_Reunion_at_the_Victory_Cafe.mp3
files.title: Reunion at the Victory Cafe
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: A couple visiting a London pub fashioned after a Second World War theme are disturbed by the sight of what looks like the husband's father, who was killed in this selfsame pub during the Blitz. A strange transformation follows - of a sudden its 1941 and the Blitz is in full swing.

files.name: Nightfall_CBC_82-07-09_02_Wildcats.Mp3
files.title: Wildcats
files.creator: Nightfall - CBC
files.description: Two elderly sisters running an almost abandoned hotel take in a stranger who gets off a train by accident and needs to stay the night. Will they ever let him leave?
